item.title: Contact form
item.description: To change language of labels and messages edit ‘static/js/contact_std_form.js’ and ‘static/mail-api/messages.json’. To configure the mail API, edit the file ‘static/mail-api/mailapi.json’

item.title: My first blog post
item.description: Duplicate this file to create a new blog post. The front matter type is blog do not change this variable. If you don't want a jumbotron image, delete the front matter variables whose names start with jumbotron.

item.title: My first page
item.description: Create a new page listed on the front page: 1. Open file manager: Navigate to the "Content" folder. 2. Duplicate page: Right-click on an existing page to open the context menu and select "Duplicate". Rename the new page, for example, to "my_first_page.html". 3. Edit page: Open the duplicated file with a double click and insert the desired content, e.g., "Hello World". 4. Edit Front matter variables: Click on "Show Front Matter Variables"

item.title: Data protection
item.description: Here you can describe what personal data you collect and how you use this user data.

item.title: Imprint
item.description: Enter your legally required business contact details here.

item.title: My second blog post
item.description: Duplicate this file to create a new blog post. The front matter type is blog do not change this variable. If you don't want a image on headline, delete the front matter variables whose names start with 'feature'. With the variable 'feature-image-left' you can influence whether the image is displayed to the left or right of the heading ( value can be 'true' or 'false' ).

item.title: My second page
item.description: If you would like an alternative to the jumbotron design, duplicate this file and change the following variables: Variable name Variable value (example) Instruction title My first page Change the title of the page here type portfolio Only change if the page should not be linked directly on the front page weight 2 Determines the order on the front page description Describes how a new page can be created Change description of page metaDescription Description of the page for search enginesâœ“ .

item.title: Promotion or credits line
item.description: At the end of the page there is a line with the credits for promoting or advertising for a specific product or company.   You change them by editing the file 'themes/inter-data/layouts/partials/promotion.html'. To show or hide the credits, the 'promotion' parameter in the central configuration file can be set to true or false.

item.title: Address and route
item.description: In the footer there are areas for the address and the route, the parameters for this are in the central configuration file:     "params": {         "addressPartTitle": "Address",         "addressName": "Name of company or author",         "addressOwner": "Name of owner",         "addressStreet": "Street",         "addressCity": "City",         "addressRegion": "Region / Locality",

item.title: Leagal information section
item.description: There is a separate area on the home page for legal information. Additional links to the pages can be added in the central configuration file. For example:         "legalnotice": [             {                 "identifier": "imprint",                 "name": "Imprint",                 "url": "/imprint/",

item.title: Search
item.description: The index file for the search is automatically created when the website is published. The text in the search field can be customized using the 'searchInputLabel' and 'searchErrorText' parameters in the central configuration file.
